resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77705</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77705</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9f73eb56-63ac-43fa-b007-05915cd7efcb#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Védekezés a kórokozók ellen, a vércsoportok</string>
            <string language="en">Protection against pathogens, blood-groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schutz gegen Krankheitserreger, Blutgruppen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protection contre des microbes pathogènes, 
groupes sanguins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proteção de encontro aos pathogens, 
blood-groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Protezione contro gli agenti patogeni, 
blood-groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προστασία ενάντια στα παθογόνα, blood-groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Protección contra los patógeno, grupos 
sanguineos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az emberi szervezet immunrendszere, az immunitás fogalma, a falósejtek és a nyiroksejtek szerepe a kórokozók elleni védekezésben; a vércsoportok és a vérátömlesztés</string>
            <string language="en">Immune system of human organism, definition of immunity, role of the phagocytes and lymphocytes in the protection against pathogens; blood-groups and blood transfusion</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">immunitás,  immunrendszer,  fehérvérsejtek,  vércsoportok,  vérátömlesztés,  </string>
            <string language="en">immunity, immune system, white blood cells, blood-groups, blood transfusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Immunes System des menschlichen Organismus, 
Definition der Immunität, Rolle der Phagozyten und Lymphozyten im 
Schutz gegen Krankheitserreger; Blutgruppen und Bluttransfusion</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système immunitaire d'organization humaine, 
définition d'immunité, rôle des phagocytes et lymphocytes dans la 
protection contre des microbes pathogènes ; groupes sanguins et
transfusion sanguine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema imune do organismo humano, definição do
immunity, papel dos phagocytes e lymphocytes na proteção de encontro
aos pathogens; blood-groups e transfusion de sangue</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema immune dell'organismo umano, definizione 
di immunità, ruolo dei fagociti e linfociti nella protezione contro 
gli agenti patogeni; blood-groups e trasfusione di sangue</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοσοποιητικό σύστημα του ανθρώπινου οργανισμού, 
καθορισμός της ασυλίας, ρόλος των φαγοκύτταρων και των 
λεμφοκυττάρων στην προστασία ενάντια στα παθογόνα  blood-groups και μετάγγιση αίματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema inmune del organismo humano, definición 
de la inmunidad, papel de los fagocitos y linfocitos en la protección
contra patógeno; grupos sanguineos y transfusión de sangre</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Immunität, immunes System, weiße Blutzellen, 
Blutgruppen, Bluttransfusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">immunité, système immunitaire, cellules de sang 
blanches, groupes sanguins, transfusion sanguine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">immunity, sistema imune, pilhas de sangue brancas, 
blood-groups, transfusion de sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immunità, sistema immune, cellule di anima bianche, 
blood-groups, trasfusione di sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ασυλία, ανοσοποιητικό σύστημα, λευκά κύτταρα αίματος, 
blood-groups, μετάγγιση αίματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inmunidad, sistema inmune, células de sangre blancas, 
grupos sanguineos, transfusión de sangre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-17</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
